item.title: 👨‍💻 About Me
item.description:
🛠️ What I Do #

AI & GenAI Solutions #

  • Build agentic AI systems leveraging LLMs, RAG pipelines, and knowledge graphs to enable autonomous decision-making, multi-step reasoning, and tool integration.

  • Develop GenAI-powered messaging platforms integrating Twilio, Perplexity AI, and advanced prompt engineering.

Backend & Distributed Systems #

  • Design and develop scalable microservices and ETL pipelines using Python, Golang, FastAPI, Django, and Celery.
  • Architect robust systems leveraging PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ, and Elasticsearch.
  • Build and maintain high-throughput, low-latency applications optimized with concurrency, sharding, and partitioning.

DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure #

  • Deploy containerized applications with Docker, Serverless, and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Monitor and optimize production systems using Grafana, AWS, and Azure.

🏆 Achievements #

  • 🥇 Champion – BRACU Intra University Programming Contest (2017, 2018)
  • 🏅 5th Nationwide – IEEE Xtreme 13.0 (2019)
  • 🏅 8th Place – UITS Inter-University Programming Contest (2019)
  • 📜 Twice on Vice Chancellor’s List with a perfect 4.00 CGPA

📚 Mentorship #

I’ve served as an IT Instructor at PONDIT, training aspiring developers in Python and Django with an industry-ready curriculum from 2022 to 2023.
